question: Which vendors have been engaged by companies that are shifting their technology stack towards machine learning solutions in their recent vendor deals?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that are shifting their technology stack towards machine learning solutions. [CompanyTechStack]
List recent vendor deals made by these companies. [CompanyDealMaster]
